291707.「そろったな。\n さっそくだが 貴様に話が……:
Good, you're here.
There's something urgent we need to discuss...

291708.「……ユーライザ！ 大丈夫なの～？\n 目の前で ヘルヴェルを失い つらい想いを:
Yuliza! Are you all right? You witnessed the
loss of Helvel right before your very eyes...
Please, don't push yourself too much...

291710.「ですが 今は 天星郷の一大事。\n ジア・クト念晶体から この世界を守るために:
But this is all so much bigger than me.
I must do what I can to protect this world
from the Dia Kut Telecrystal.

291711.「お姉様なら きっと そうしたはずですから。: I'm sure Helvel would have done the same.

291712.「そう……。\n 強くなったのね ユーライザ。\n きっと ヘルヴェルの魂も 喜:
You're right... You've gotten so strong,
Yuliza. Helvel is definitely smiling down on
you from up high.

291713.「まず 最初に……何を置いても\n <pc>には 謝っておかねばなるまいな。:
Now, before we get to business...
I need to apologize to you, <pc>.
For everything.

291714.「これまで 我ら天使は くだらぬ流言を信じ\n 貴様に対し 邪険な態度を 取って:
Not long ago, we were deceived by false rumors about you and treated you harshly as a result. I can't even begin to imagine how much
you've been through because of it.

291715.「悪神の討伐 ジア・クト念晶体との戦闘……\n 貴様が成しとげた 数々の功績を:
In light of the fiends' defeat, and the battle
with Dia Kut... I must confess that we were
all fools.

291716.「どうか これまでの非礼を 詫びさせてくれ。\n 虫のいいことだとは 百も承知だ:
Please accept our sincerest apologies.
I know this is asking a lot, but...are you
willing to lend us your aid once more?<yesno><close>

291717.「私からも お願いします。この世界を\n ジア・クトどもから守るには どうしても:
I echo his sentiment.
Please, we desperately need your power to
protect the world from Dia Kut.<yesno><close>

291718.「すまない。心から 感謝する……！:
I am truly sorry to have to make such a
request. From the bottom of my heart...
thank you!

291719.「……では 本題に入ろう。\n 先の戦いで 我々は ジア・クト念晶体を\n 撤退:
Right then, let's cut to the chase.
In our recent battle, we succeeded in
forcing the Dia Kut Telecrystal to retreat.

291720.「だが アストルティアの楯の加護を 失った以上\n ヤツらが 戻ってくるのは 時:
But now that we've lost the blessing of the Shield of Astoltia, it's only a matter of time before they return. We must fortify our
defenses as swiftly as possible.

291721.「しかし……同胞である ヘルヴェルが死に\n 英雄のひとり レオーネは\n ジア:
However...our own Helvel is dead, and the
champion Leone has joined hands with Dia
Kut.

291722.「貴様とフォステイル以外の 英雄たちは\n いまだ 眠りについたまま……。\n:
And aside from you and Fostail, the other
champions are still asleep. To be quite frank,
the situation seems completely hopeless.

291723.「天星郷は 今 混乱のまっただ中にある。\n まずは これを おさめねば\n ヤ:
The Firmament is in the midst of chaos. Before
we can we even begin to stage any sort of
counterattack, things must be calmed here.

291724.「そのためにも ふたりには\n 行方不明となった 天使長の捜索を 頼みたい。:
To that end, I ask that you two begin
searching for the missing Archangel.

291725.「ですが あれだけの攻撃を受け 天使長が\n ご無事かどうか……。そもそも 今ど:
But after sustaining so much damage, we can't
be certain that she's safe...or where to even
begin looking, for that matter...

291726.「その点なら 心配ご無用。\n 天使長の足取りは 見当がついていますよ。:
No need to worry.
I have a good lead on her location.

291727.「時間が かかってしまいましたが\n あの方の持つ 天使のチカラを たどることで:
It took some doing, but by tracing her angelic
powers, I was able to approximate her
whereabouts.

291728.「天使長は あのジア・ルミナと名乗る者の\n 攻撃を受け 天星郷から\n 下界に:
After the attack by that Dia Lumina, she fell
down into the lower world.

291729.「そのまま アストルティアの南東\n プクランド大陸の チョッピ荒野あたりに\n:
She seems to have drifted towards a region in
southeast Astoltia一namely, the Choppi
Wilderness located in Pukuland.

291730.「しかし……どういうわけか\n そこで チカラの反応が薄れ\n 正確な位置は わ:
Yet...for some reason, her power faded, and I
was unable to determine her exact
whereabouts...

291731.「もしかしたら 天使長の身に\n 何か 起こったのかも しれません。: Something may have happened to her.

291732.「チョッピ荒野には 人々の集う集落が\n あるようだが……そこで 情報を集めるの:
It seems there are settlements located there,
but...gathering information is difficult for
angels unfamiliar with the surface world.

291733.「もはや 我々には 一刻の猶予もない。\n 急ぎ アストルティアにおもむき\n:
We have no time to lose.
I need you to go to Astoltia and bring the
Archangel back to us!

291734.「……おっ 見ない顔だな。\n よそ者かァ？:
Now dere's an unfamiliar face!
Youse new 'round heah?

291735.「ヒヒッ ようこそ\n 享楽と堕落の都 魔窟アラモンドへ！:
Allow me to kindly welcome youse to Alamond
Cavern, city of pleasure an' corruption!

291736.「ここは ならず者 おたずね者……。\n 人生の落ちこぼれどもが集う ゴミためさ:
Riffraff, rejoice!
Dis here's a paradise for the down-an'-outs
a' life.

291737.「昔は まっとうな 鉱山だったんだけどなァ。\n 廃坑になってからは プクランド:
Used ta be, dis place was an honest mine. But evah since it got abandoned, crooks from all over Pukusland have swarmed heah like
flies, and you can see what's become of it.

291738.「アンタらは どうして ここに？\n 盗みや殺し……表舞台から 追い出されるよう:
So, whatta YOUSE doin' here? Mug someone? Ice
a fella? What'd you do that was bad enough ta
get ya kicked off ta fastidious stage a' life?

291740.「ね～ぇ……<heart>\n アンタ どこから来たの～？\n アタシと 遊ばな:
Hey there, cutie～<heart>
Where'd you wander in from～?
Wanna come play with me～?

291741.「け 結構ですッ！ 間に合ってますので！:
N-no thank you!
We're pressed for time!

291742.「危ないところでした……。\n 気をつけてくださいね <pc>。:
That was close...
Please be careful here.

291743.「……なんと 罪深き者たちでしょう。\n 本当に このようなところに\n 天使長:
...What a sinful place.
Will we really find the Archangel in a town
like this?

291746.「間違いありません！ 天使の羽根です！:
There's no doubt about it!
It's an angel's feather!

291748.「これが あるということは\n 天使長は やはり ここにいると見て\n 間違いな:
This confirms that the Archangel is here after
all.

291749.「まさか 悪党どもに つかまり\n 身動きが 取れなくなっているのでは！？\n:
No way! She's stuck in the middle of nowhere
with a bunch of一of HOODLUMS?!
We have to help her as swiftly as possible!

291750.「まずは このあたりの者たちに\n 話を 聞いてみましょう。天使長のことを\n:
We should start by talking to the townsfolk
around here. Maybe some of them have seen
her.

291751.「……これはこれは。\n エルトナ大陸を牛耳ってる あのツバクロ組と\n 取り引:
Che bello. It's an honor to do business wit
a member of the Barn Swallows. You-a control
Eltona from the shadows, no?

291752.「ようこそ 魔窟アラモンドへ！\n 歓迎するぜぇ。:
Welcome to Alamond Cavern!
We receive-a you wid open arms.

291753.「俺は ここでの商売を\n 取り仕切っている プティーノだ。\n ま ヨロシク頼:
I'm-a Putino, the man in charge a' bidness
heah. I look forward to workin' wid you.

291754.「アンタたちとの取り引きは はじめてだからな。\n まずは 商品の説明を させて:
Now, dis's our first time doin' bidness, no?
Lemme start by explainin' the product.

291755.「ウワサには 聞いてるだろう？\n これが このアラモンドでしか採れない\n 幻:
You've heard-a da rumors, I presume?
Dis here's Alamond Ore.
Like-a the name says, it's only found here.

291756.「コイツは タダの鉱石じゃないぞ。\n 最高級の砂糖……アラモン糖の材料になる\:
And dis ain't just any ol' ore, see?
It's made of a rare white substance dat's used
to make the legendary Alamond Sugar.

291757.「ひとくち食べるだけで まさに楽園の心地。\n かつて プクランド中の プクリポ:
One bite is a taste of paradiso. Pukulipo all
over Pukuland were once crazy for its sugary
yumminess. Fa venire l’acquolina in bocca!

291758.「だが アラモン糖の あまりのウマさに\n 大陸中のプクリポが 菓子の食い過ぎで:
But dat yummy sugar was-a SO yummy that Pukulipo all over da continent became fatsos from eatin' too many sweets, y'see?
It became a bit of a, how you say, "social issue".

291759.「当時 即位したばかりの プーポッパン王は\n 肥満の原因である アラモン糖を\:
King Puupoppan, who 'ad recently ascended to
da throne, ordered the mine closed in order to
destroy da root cause of da obesity.

291760.「かくして アラモン糖は\n プクランド大陸から 姿を消し\n プクリポたちの健:
Thus, Alamond Sugar vanished from Pukuland,
and da Pukulipos' health was preserved...

291761.「ヒヒッ……だが どうしても\n アラモン糖の味を 忘れられない\n 甘党の皆様:
But dere's a strong demand from those with a
sweet tooth who just can't get the taste of
Alamond sugar outta dere minds, see?

291762.「どうしてもって 言われちゃ しかたねえ。\n こっそり ご提供して\n ガッポ:
And if-a they insist, who'm I to say no,
y'know? So we make a lotta moolah by offerin' it
all secret-like.

291763.「アラモン糖をご所望ってことは スイーツ関係で\n 新しいビジネスを 始めるんだ:
If you want Alamond sugar, dat must mean you're startin' a new bidness in the sweets industry, no? Heh! You've got a good eye for
opportunity!

291764.「アンタらとは 今後とも\n ヨロシクやっていきたいし\n 特別価格で 融通して:
I looks forward to workin' wit you.
I'll even offer you a special price as a show
a' goodwill.

291765.「……そんなものに 用はありません！\n 私たちは 大切なお方を\n 救出するた:
We have no use for something like that!
We're here to rescue someone very important
to us.

291766.「すでに 調べはついています！\n 翼の生えた女性が ここにいるはずです！\n:
We've investigated around town; we know the
winged lady is here!
Release her immediately, or else we'll...!

291767.「はっはっはっは！ なーるほどなぁ。\n アンタら あのヒトの知り合いか！:
Ha ha ha ha! Capisco!
You guys-a know-a that chick?

291768.「身内を助けるために わざわざ\n こんなとこまで来るとは 健気じゃねえか。\n:
Comin' all the way heres to help one of your
own, ain't that just heartwarming?
Howevah...

291769.「おおっと お帰りのようだ。\n どうしても連れて帰りたきゃ 副長の俺じゃなく\:
Oh, sounds like da boss is back. If you really wanna take dat chick home, you'll have to negotiate directly with the emperor, not with
me. I'm-a just second-in-command.

291771.「キャ～！ 帝王 カッコイイ～！！:
Waaahh～!
The emperor is, like, SO cool～!!

291772.「……ハハハッ いいね。\n やはり 気分がクサクサしたときには\n コイツを:
Haha...you're too kind.
Whenever I'm in a bad mood, I just roll this
bad boy out and all that stress goes away.

291773.「お前らァ どけどけぇーい！\n 我らが 魔窟アラモンドを 統べるボス……\n:
Make way, one and all!
Here comes the big boss who rules this den of
sin: the one, the only...Meteor! Queen! MITRA!

291774.「て 天使長！？ 何やってるんですかッ！: A-archangel?! What are you doing here?!

291775.「おや？ お前たち どうしてここに？: Hmm? I should ask you the same question.

291776.「どうしてって……。\n 私たち 天使長を助けにきたんです。\n この集落の悪党:
But why are you...we're here to help you!
We...thought these ruffians had kidnapped
you...

291777.「……あーっはっはっはっは！ これは傑作だ。\n 私が コイツらに つかまっただ:
...Ahahahaha!
Oh, this is priceless! You really thought
these guys had taken me captive?

291778.「ここへ 落ちてきたときの衝撃で\n チカラの大半を失くし\n ご覧の通り 片翼:
When I fell here, I lost most of my strength.
Even lost one of my wings, as you can see.

291779.「天星郷には帰れないし 行くあてもないしで\n フラフラしてたら チョッピ荒野で:
I couldn't return to the Firmament, and I didn't have anywhere else I could go...so I wandered around the wilderness for a while
when some of these little guys began teasing me.

291780.「ちょうど 虫の居どころが 悪かったから\n 腹いせに 返り討ちにしてやったら\:
I was hardly in the mood, and I ended up
taking out my anger on them. Guess they took
a liking to me, and they made me their boss.

291781.「そんなことより……これを見てくれ！\n 愛する大陸間鉄道を モチーフに作らせた:
But that's hardly important right now... Feast your eyes on THIS baby! I had it custom made in the image of my beloved Ark of the
Earth. Well? Beautiful, isn't she?

291782.「ひとまず ご無事なようで 何よりです！\n さあ いっしょに 天星郷に戻りまし:
In any case, I'm glad that you're safe. Now
come on, we need to return to the Firmament.
Everyone is so worried about you...

291783.「……悪いが 天星郷に戻る気は ない。:
...Sorry, but I have no intention of going
back.

291784.「私がいようといまいと 結果は変わらない。\n アストルティアは……滅びる運命。:
With or without me, the outcome won't change.
Astoltia...is doomed.

291785.「フフッ どちらにしろ 片翼を失った 私には\n 戦うことはおろか 天星郷に戻る:
Heh. Besides, without my other wing, there's
no way I'd be able to fight or return to the
city anyways.

291786.「天使長の座は そうだな……。\n カンティスにでも ゆずろう。みんなには\n:
As for the Archangel position... Oh, I know!
Let Kantis have it. Just go back and tell
everyone that Mitra is dead.

291788.「ずっと 天使たちの先頭に立ち\n 世界の守護のため 尽力してきた あなたが\n:
You've been at the forefront of our efforts to
protect the world all these years!
So...why...?

291789.「……もしかして アンタたちさぁ。\n ミト様 追っかけてる系？:
...Hey, you two.
Are you, like, looking for Mitie too, by any
chance?

291791.「ウェ～～～イ！ やっぱりぃ～！\n アンタたち ミト様の\n 熱烈なファン的な:
WAAAAAAY～! I KNEW it!
You guys are, like, TOTALLY Mitie fans too,
aren't you?!

291792.「ミト様って カリスマっていうの～？\n すんごいオーラ 出てるもんね～？\n:
Mitie's like, soooooo charming, isn't she～? Don't you, like, lowkey get GOOSEBUMPS just thinking about her～? It's only natural that
that she'd have fans from out of town.

291793.「アタシも ミト様 マジすこなの！\n ミト担のヒトに会えて 超カンゲキ～！\n:
I'm actually like a huuuuuuuge Mitie fan too!
And I LOVE meeting other fans～!
Come on, let's be friends! WAY!

291795.「とりま 親睦深めるために お茶しな～い？\n みんなで 思う存分 ミト様トーク:
Wanna, like, chat over tea to get to know each
other better? We can talk about Mitie 'til the
sun comes up! ...Way! It's a date!

291796.「ここの１階に アタシ オススメの\n 超バズってる カフェがあるから～！\n:
There's a cafe on the first floor here that's,
like, literally amazing.
I'm going on ahead! Don't be long～!

291797.「……行ってしまいました。\n 何を言っているのか ほとんど\n 理解できません:
...And there she goes.
I could hardly understand a word she was
saying...

291798.「ここで こうしていても しかたがありません。\n とりあえず あの娘の話を\n:
Well, we don't have anything else to do here.
I guess for now, let's just hear what she has
to say.

291799.「おっ疲れちゃ～ん★\n 流れ星 見つかった～？:
Heyooooo～!
Did you find the shooting stars～?

291800.「４つめの……最後の流れ星については\n 何か わかりましたか？:
Have you learned anything about where the
fourth one might be?

291801.「……ぜーんぜんっ！\n チョッピ荒野に 落ちたらしいって話なんだけど\n そん:
...Nada!
I heard it might've fallen in the Choppi
Wilderness, but I couldn't find a trace.

291803.「早く 見つけてあげたいな～！\n きっと ミト様 気分あげぽよ\n 間違いなー:
I, like, can't WAIT to find them though～!
I'm sure Mitie'll be like, SUPER happy to see
'em again～!

291804.「ほう？ どう あげぽよ なのかな？\n ぜひ 聞かせてほしいものだねぇ。:
Hmm? What's this about something that'll make
me happy? Do tell. I'd love to hear about it.

291805.「て 天使長っ！ どうしてここに？: A-archangel! What are you doing here?

291806.「どうしてって 私は ここの常連だからね。\n 過去に絶望して 死ぬほど 甘いも:
I'm a regular here.
I come here whenever I want to drown my past
in a sugary parfait.

291807.「ふっふっふ……ユーライザぁ。\n ここのスイーツは 絶品だぞう？\n どんな苦:
Heheheh... The sweets here are exquisite,
aren't they, Yuliza? They make all the bitter
memories just float right away.

291808.「最高級の アラモン糖を\n たーっぷり使った カロリーマシマシ\n 悪魔の味だ:
It's a devilish delight, a caloric menagerie
of that delightful Alamond Sugar.

291809.「アラモンドに 足を踏み入れて\n これを食さずに帰るなど 言語道断！\n 店長:
Why, it's unthinkable to set foot in Alamond
and leave without trying this!
Manager! Lovely Rainbow Tea, pleaseーfor two!

291810.「こ これは……！\n こんな おいしいもの\n はじめて クチにしました……！:
Th-this...this is the most delicious thing
I've ever tasted...!!

291811.「でしょ？ でしょ～？\n ユーちゃんに 気に入ってもらえて\n 超ウレシ～！:
I KNOW, right～?
I'm like, so glad you like it, Yuyu!
Way!

291812.「ねぇねぇ ユーちゃんって\n もともと ミト様の知り合いなんでしょ～？\n ミ:
Hey, hey!
You're like, Mitie's friends, right～?
What does she do back where you're from?

291813.「えっと 天使ちょ……ミトラー様は\n 私が 住んでいる地を\n 治めていらっし:
Well, the ArchーI mean...
Mitra is the ruler of the place I'm from...

291814.「この世界に暮らす皆が 平和に過ごせるよう\n 日々 尽力している\n すばらし:
She's a wonderful person who works hard every
day to make sure that everyone in the world
can live in peace.

291815.「それって ユーちゃんの住んでたとこでも\n 帝王やってたってコト～？\n ウェ:
So you're, like, an emperor where you're from,
too～?
WAY! That's like, soooooo incredible, Mitie～!

291816.「ミト様って 鬼ツヨだし ルックスも神っしょ？\n だから アラモンドのみんなか:
You're super powerful and cool and stuff, but
you're also like, super pretty and graceful
too? It's no wonder everyone loves you here～!

291817.「アタシもさ～ ちっちゃいころに\n 親を亡くして ひとりで生きてきて～\n 頼:
I totally, like, lost my parents when I was
little, y'know～? So I never had anyone to
take care of me. But, like...

291818.「ミト様は 出会ったばかりの アタシに\n 優しくしてくれて 守ってくれて ママ:
Mitie was super nice to me and protected me
when we first met, and I started to wonder...
if this is what it's like to have a mom.

291819.「ミト様は アタシの……アラモンドのママなの！\n ミト様がいてくれるから アタ:
Mitie's totally like myーno, like EVERYONE in
Alamond's mom, y'know～?
We're all so happy because of you～!

291820.「ミト様 だーいすきっ★\n ずーっと アタシたちと いっしょにいてね！\n 約:
We love you sooooooooo much, Mitie!
So like, stay here forever, okay?!
Promise～!

291821.「ああ……そうだね。\n お前たちと ずっと こうしていられたら……。:
Ah...if only.
I wish I could stay here with all of you like
this forever...

291822.「すまない 急用を思いだした。\n 私は ここで 失礼するよ。:
Sorry, I just remembered something important
that I need to take care of.
This is where I take my leave.

291823.「……やっぱ ミト様 テンション低いな～。\n 超しんぱ～い……。:
...I knew it.
Mitie's totally bummed about something
lately... I'm supes worried...

291827.「歩き回って お疲れ系？\n そりゃ そうだよね～。\n たくさん歩かせちゃって:
You're like, tired from all that walking, huh?
My B, I guess I did give you a bit of a
workout～!

291828.「こんなこともあろうかと 宿屋のおばちゃんに\n 部屋用意しとくよう 頼んどいた:
I asked the inn lady to set up a room for you
in case something like this happened, so like,
go get a good rest, okay～? Way～!

291829.「……そうですね。\n <pc>も 疲れたでしょう？\n お言葉に甘えることに:
Did you now?
Well, I'm sure <pc> must be tired
too. We may just take you up on that offer.

291831.「天使長 お願いします。\n どうか 天星郷に お戻りください。:
Archangel, please. You have to return to the
Firmament.

291832.「ジア・クトを倒し アストルティアを守るために\n どうしても あなたのおチカラ:
We desperately need your help to defeat Dia
Kut and protect Astoltia.

291833.「……倒す か。\n 簡単に 言ってくれるな。\n ヤツらを倒せると 本気で思っ:
...defeat them, huh? Don't say that so
casually. Do you really think you can?

291834.「いい機会だ。教えてやろう。\n ヤツらと 我ら天使の因縁を。\n 我らが故郷…:
This is a good opportunity. Let me tell you
about the fate of them and us angels...
and about our home...the Eternal Cradle.

291835.「これは 創世の女神と その眷属たちの物語……:
This is the story of the Goddess of Creation
and her followers...

291836.「ここより はるか彼方……星の海の向こう側。\n とこしえのゆりかごという 世界:
Far from here, beyond the sea of stars...there
was a world known as Eternal Cradle.

291837.「偉大なる神々の 加護を受け\n すべての生きとし 生ける者たちが\n 平和に暮:
A utopia where all living beings could live
in peace, blessed by the mighty gods...

291838.「だが 平和な日々に 終わりを告げるように\n ヤツら……ジア・クト念晶体が\n:
But as if to signal the end of those peaceful
days...the Dia Kut Telecrystal appeared.

291839.「いにしえの大崩壊と呼ばれる 厄災……\n ヤツらは とこしえのゆりかごを蹂躙し:
In the catastrophe known as the Ancient Collapse, they laid waste to the Eternal Cradle and went to great lengths to destroy
it.

291840.「とこしえのゆりかごを創りし 旧き神は\n 若き女神 ルティアナに 創生のチカラ:
The ancient gods who created the Cradle entrusted the power of creation to the young goddess, Lutiana, and sent her away from that
dying world.

291841.「我らの祖先……とこしえのゆりかごの住人たちも\n 天の船 フォーリオンに乗り\:
Our ancestors, also inhabitants of the Cradle,
left with the goddess aboard the heavenly
ship, Fourion.

291842.「長き長き 旅の果て ついに\n 女神は 安息の地にたどりつき\n 創生のチカラ:
After a long and arduous journey, the goddess
finally arrived at a place of rest, andーwith
the power of creationーcreated a new world.

291843.「その地の名は アストルティア。\n ゆりかごの民が待ち望んだ 最後の楽園。:
The name of that place was Astoltia. It was
the final paradise the Cradle's people had
longed for.

291844.「女神は この楽園を ジア・クトの魔の手から\n 守るため すべての邪悪を しり:
To protect this paradise from the horrors of Dia Kut, the goddess created the Shield of Astoltia...a treasure that could repel all
evil.

291845.「しかし……楯が完成する前に\n 深い闇にまぎれ アストルティアに\n 潜りこむ:
However...before the shield was completed,
a being managed to sneak into Astoltia
under the guise of a deep darkness.

291846.「その者の名は ジア・グオヌバ。: That being's name was Dia Gonuba.

291847.「そう……我々が 異界滅神ジャゴヌバと\n 呼んでいた厄災は もともとは\n ジ:
That's right...the calamity we named Jagonuba,
the Otherwordly Destroyer... He was originally
a fragment of the Dia Kut Telecrystal.

291848.「アストルティアの楯の結界が あったからこそ\n 我々は 長い間 ジャゴヌバ以外:
It was only because of the Shield of
Astoltia's warding that were to hide from
the rest of Dia Kut for so long.

291849.「だが アストルティアの楯が 破壊され\n ヤツらに 存在が知られてしまった以上:
But now that the shield has been destroyed and
our presence is known...there's nothing we
can do.

291850.「あの子も……ヘルヴェルも 死なせてしまった。\n ジア・クトに 勝つことなど:
I let her... I let Helvel die, too... There is
no possible way we can win against Dia Kut.
Everything I've tried has ended in failure.

291853.「私は……<pc>をはじめとした\n 英雄たちと出会い その生き様に触れ……\n:
I...I met <pc> and the other
champions, and learned about their ways of
life...I learned quite a lot.

291854.「私は……<pc>をはじめとした\n 英雄たちと出会い その生き様に触れ……\n:
I...I met <pc> and the other
champions, and learned about their ways of
life...I learned quite a lot.

291855.「みな 祖国と大切な者たちを 守るため\n その命をかけて 戦っていた。\n た:
They all fought with their lives to protect
their homelands they cared so much about.
Even if victory seemed impossible!

291856.「四天の星巡りに挑み 神になろうとしたのも\n みな この世界……アストルティア:
The reason they underwent the Four Heavenly
Trials and wanted to become gods was because
they deeply love this world...of Astoltia.

291857.「彼らが守ろうとした世界を……その想いを！\n 運命なんて言葉で 片づけるなど\:
To dismiss this world they try to protect,
and their feelings with a word like destiny...
I cannot stand for that!

291858.「ここで 私たちが あきらめてしまえば\n 世界は ジア・クトどもに\n 踏みに:
If we give up now, this world will be overrun
by those Dia Kut beings.

291859.「ピコさんも……\n アラモンドに暮らす 皆さんも\n みんな みんな 死んでし:
Pico...and all the others living in Alamond...
They're all going to die!

291860.「それが 運命だと……\n 滅びるのは しかたないことだと\n 本気で おっしゃ:
Are you seriously saying it's destiny...
That it's inevitable we will be destroyed?!

291861.「……やれやれ 私相手に\n 言うようになったじゃないか。だんだんと\n ヘルヴ:
Okay, I get the picture...I see you've started
talking to me like that, too. You're becoming
more and more like Helvel, you know.

291862.「お前たちが 探していたのは コレだろう？: This is what you were after, right?

291863.「お前たちの集めてきた分と 合わせれば\n かつてのチカラを 取り戻し\n 天星:
If you combine what you've gathered so far
with this, then I might just have enough
energy to return to the Firmament.

291864.「アストルティアに生を受けた者の 代表として\n お前に問おう。ジア・クト念晶体:
As a representative of those born in Astoltia, let me ask you. Do you have the will and the determination to fight against the Dia Kut
Telecrystal, and protect this world?

291865.「この戦いは 厳しいものになるでしょう……。\n ですが 数々の危機を 乗り越え:
This battle will no doubt be hard...but you've
overcome many a crisis before. You will do
just fine. Please have confidence in yourself!

291866.「前にも言った通り 天星郷に戻るつもりはない。\n どうしても 私を 連れ戻した:
As I said before, I've no intention of going back. If you really insist on taking me, then you'll have to do so via the customs of this
place.

291867.「魔窟アラモンドでは 勝者こそが正義……。\n 私と決闘しろ <pc>。\n お:
Here in Alamond, the victor decides.
Duel against me, <pc>. If you win,
you're free to take me back with you.

291868.「決闘の内容は こちらで決める。\n その気になったら アラモンドの広場にいる\:
I'll decide the conditions of the duel. If
you're game, then find Pechapo in Alamond's
plaza and speak with him.

291869.「この 帝王ミトラーに 簡単に勝てると思うな。\n アストルティアを救いたいと:
Don't think that you can defeat the Emperor
Mitra so easily. If you really want to save
Astoltia...then speak with your determination.

291870.<pc>と ユーライザは\n宿屋に戻り 眠りについた。:
<pc> and Yuliza returned to the inn
and fell asleep.

291872.「これより！ 流星の帝王 ミトラーと\n 挑戦者 <pc>の 決闘を執り行う！:
This is it! Da destined duel between our
Meteor Queen, Mitra, and <pc>,
da newcomer, is 'bout to begin!

291873.「ルールは いたって シンプルだ。\n チョッピ荒野の 断崖に向かって 全力で\:
Da rules are-a simple. Go as fast as you-a can
on those Dolbikes towards the Choppi cliffs!
It's-a chicken race to da death!

291874.「ビビッて 先に ブレーキをかけるか\n 判断を誤り 海に落ちたほうの負けだ！:
The biggest scaredy-cat who-a brakes first
or makes-a wrong turn at Ocean Avenue is
da loser, capicse?

291875.「よーし 両者 覚悟はできたか！？\n エンジンをかけろぉ！:
All-right! Are youse both ready?!
Start revvin' those-a engines!

291909.「おかしいですね……。\n ピコさんの姿が 見えません。\n どこへ行ってしまっ:
That's strange...I don't see Pico anywhere.
Where could she have gone?

291912.「うわぁぁ～～ん！ 来ないで～～～～！！\n マジ ムリだっての～～～～！！:
Waaahh! P-please go away～!
J-just leave me alone～!

291913.「あ！ バカバカバカ！\n それは ミト様の だいじなものなの！\n 返して 返:
No, no! I'm sososososo STUPID!!
That's Mitie's super important feather!
Please please PLEASE give it back!!

291914.「……天使のチカラを 取り込んで 変身した！？:
He used that angelic power and transformed
somehow?!

291915.「チカラを制御できずに 暴走している！\n ……いけないッ！:
He can't control that power and has gone
berserk! You can't...!

291917.「クッ……さすがは 天使長のチカラ。\n ピコさんを かばいながら\n 戦うのは:
Ggh...of course he's strong because of the
Archangel's power... It'll be difficult to
fight and protect Pico at the same time...

291918.「おい そこのデカブツーッ！\n 私のかわいいピコに 何してやがるオラァッッ！:
Hey! You big blockhead! Don't you DARE lay a
finger on my cute little Pico!!

291919.「ピコのことは まかせろ！\n 結界を張るから\n お前たちは 存分に戦ってくれ:
Leave Pico to me! I'll set up a barrier, so
you guys can give this blockhead a proper
pounding!

291923.「ぶわぁぁぁぁぁぁん！\n ミト様ぁ……！ ごわがっだよぉ……！:
W...waaaaaaaahhh!!! Mitie!!!
It was so scary!!

291924.「……これまで この世界を守るのは\n 祖先より 受け継がれた使命だからと……\:
Until now...I've held the responsibility of protecting this world as a duty passed down to me from my ancestors...and I've been treating
it like it's someone else's problem.

291925.「しかし アストルティアに 降りたち\n アラモンドの皆と 過ごしているうちに\:
But when I came to Astoltia and spent more and
more time with the people in Alamond, my mind
began to change...

291926.「私は ここに生きる者たちが 好きだ。\n アストルティアに 生きる者すべてを\:
I love all the people who live here. I want to
protect everyone who lives in Astoltia...
I don't want anyone to die!

291927.「だが ジア・クトの勢力は 強大だ。\n 私が ひとつでも 決断を間違えば\n:
But Dia Kut is immensely powerful. Even just
one wrong move could spell death for so
many innocent lives.

291928.「私が しくじれば 私の大切な者たちが\n みんな みんな 死んでしまう。\n:
If I mess up, then all those I hold dear,
every single of them...they'll die. That's
what makes me scared and helpless...

291930.「ミト様なら できるよ！\n ミト様 すんごく 強いんだもん！\n どんなヤツが:
You CAN do it, Mitie! You're like, the
STRONGEST person I know! Nobody can beat
you! Nobody!

291931.「アタシ 知ってるもん！\n ミト様が どんなに すごいヒトか！:
And I totally already know just how absolutely
amazing of a person you are!

291932.「ミト様が 自分を信じられないなら\n アタシたちが 信じるから！\n だから:
If you won't believe in yourself, then you
bet we will instead! You'll be like, totes
fine!

291933.「そ そうだそうだ！\n ウチの帝王は 最強だ！\n 誰にも 負けたりなんて し:
S-she's-a right! Our emperor is da cream
o' the crop! Nobody beats her!

291934.「アタシたち……ううん！\n この世界みんなの 帝王になってよ！\n それで こ:
You gotta be our...uh uh! You gotta be the
emperor of the whole wide world!!
You gotta protect EVERYONE!

291935.「帝王！ 帝王！！ 帝王！！！\n 帝王！ 帝王！！ 帝王！！！:
Em-pe-ror! Em-pe-ror! Em-pe-ror!
Em-pe-ror! Em-pe-ror! Em-pe-ror!

291938.「……聞けぇ お前たちィ！\n 私は 今日で 魔窟アラモンドの帝王を\n 卒業す:
Listen up, everyone! As of today, I am no
longer emperor of Alamond!

291939.「この世界に 仇なす\n クソったれどもを ぶっ潰すため\n 私は 私のあるべき:
I'm headed back to the place where I belong,
so I can beat back those brutes who think
they can just mess up our world!

291940.「ここに 誓う！ 私は\n 全世界の帝王として アストルティアを！\n お前たち:
I swear to you all! As emperor of the world,
I WILL protect Astoltia! I promise I will
protect you all!

291941.「……愛してるぜ！ お前ら！\n 達者で 暮らせよ！: I love you all dearly! Be good, and live well!

291943.「さぁ 私たちも 天星郷に帰りましょう。: Come on, let's go back to the Firmament, too.

291944.「やぁ。ふたりとも アラモンドでは\n すっかり 世話になったね。:
Hey, guys. You two were a big help to me in
Alamond.

291945.「これは 私からの 感謝の気持ちだ。\n 遠慮せずに 受け取ってくれ。:
This is my way of saying thank you. Feel free
to accept it.

291946.「……皆 私のいない間 苦労をかけた。: ...everyone has suffered a lot in my absence.

291947.「先の戦いで 我らは 多くのものを失った。\n アストルティアの楯を 破壊されて:
We lost so much in the last battle. Now that
the Shield of Astoltia has been destroyed, a
battle with Dia Kut is inevitable.

291948.「だが どれだけ 厳しい戦になろうとも\n 我々に 敗北は許されない。:
But no matter how hard the battle gets, we
cannot afford to lose.

291949.「諸君 剣を取れ！ 今こそ 我らの手で\n 神話時代からの因縁に 決着をつけると:
Gentlemen, take up your swords! Now is the
time for us to settle a score that dates back
to mythical times!

291950.「……私は もう 逃げない。\n たとえ 我が身が 朽ち果てようとも\n この世:
I will run no more. Even if my body is to rot
away, I will fight to protect this world and
those I hold dear.

291951.「すべては アストルティアのために。\n それが 世界の守り人である\n 我らの:
All for the sake of Astoltia. That is our
mission, the guardians of the world!

291952.「……よーし てめえらァ！\n この全面戦争 絶対に勝利するぞ！\n ジア・クト:
All right, you guys! We're going to win this
all-out war! I'm gonna kick Dia Kut's ass!

291953.「て 天使長……。\n その 言葉遣いは いったい……？:
Hey, Archangel... what the heck is that
language?

291954.「ほほほ！\n 天使長ったら アストルティアに行くたび\n 何かしら影響されて:
Ho-ho-ho! Every time Archangel goes to
Astoltia, he comes back affected in some way~!

291955.「４００年前も たしか そうでしたね……。: I believe it was like that 400 years ago...

291957.「騒がしいぞ。何があった？: You're making a racket. What happened?

291958.「て て て 天星郷の空に……\n きょ きょ 巨大な……: In the sky of Heaven... a giant...

291959.「とにかく 外に出て 見てみてください！\n エライことが 起きてるんでさあ！:
Anyway, get out there and take a look!
Something terrible is happening!

295291.「……ふむ。興味深い。\n どういう仕掛けに なっているのかな？: ...hmmm. Interesting. I wonder how it works?

295292.「ちっ……もう戻ってきたか。\n こんなに 早いとは……。:
Damn...you're back already. I didn't realize
it was so soon...

295293.「ンフフ……<heart>\n また会えたな ゆりかごの末裔よ。:
Nuh-uh...<heart> So good to see you again,
Descendant of the Cradle.

295294.「想定外だった。まさか お前たちに\n 我らを退けるだけの チカラがあったとは。:
It was unexpected. I never thought you had the
strength to defeat us.

295295.「認めよう お前たちを。\n ジア・クトに 相応する敵として！\n よって ここ:
I recognize you. As worthy enemies of Dia Kut!
Therefore, I hereby declare.

295296.「アストルティアへの侵略を 開始する！: We are launching an invasion of Astoltia!

295297.「うっ……！ この光は！？\n 何が起こったの……？: Ugh...! What is this light? What happened...?

295298.「て 天使長っ！\n オーグリード大陸の バドリー岩石地帯の南に\n 異常なエネ:
Archangel! There's an anomalous energy
signature to the south of the Budley Rock Zone
on Ogreed Continent!

295299.「ここからでも わかるほどに\n 強い エネルギー反応……。\n 周辺も 無事で:
The energy signature is so strong that even
from here I can tell that the surrounding area
is not safe.

295300.「ついに 我が船が 着陸を果たした！\n お前たちの 大地に！: At last, my ship has landed! On your soil!

295301.「ンフ……<heart> 待っているぞ。\n 見せてみろ。お前たちのあがきを。:
Nuh...<heart> I'm waiting for you. Show us. Let's
see how you guys do.

295302.「船が 着陸した……？\n 急いで アストルティアの人々に\n 警告しなくては…:
A ship has landed...? We must hurry and warn
the people of Astoltia.

295303.「落ち着け ユーライザ。\n いずれ こうなることは わかっていた。:
Calm down, Yuliza. I knew this would happen
sooner or later.

295304.「私の方でも 対策は考えているが\n 事態は 一刻を争うようだ。:
I am trying to think of countermeasures, but
the situation seems to be time sensitive.

295305.「まずは すぐに動ける お前たちふたりで\n 地上周辺の調査に 向かってくれ。:
First, I want you two, who can move quickly,
to investigate the area around the ground.

295306.「しょ……承知いたしました。\n 動揺してしまい 申し訳ありません。: I understand. I am sorry for being upset.

295307.「バドリー岩石地帯といえば たしか\n ガートラント王国の 近くだったはずです。:
The Budley Rock Zone, I believe, is near the
Kingdom of Gartlant.

295308.「<pc>は ガートラントの王である\n グロスナー王とも 顔見知りでしたね。:
<pc> was also acquainted with King
Grossner, king of Gartlant.

295309.「船に近寄らないよう 警告も必要でしょうし \n オーグリード大陸の ガートラン:
We may need to warn him to stay away from the
ship, and we should go see King Grossner at
Gartlant Castle in Ogreed Continent.

302438.断崖が 近づいてきた……。\nブレーキを かけますか？<yesno_nc><cl:
The cliff is closely approaching...
Press on the brakes?<yesno_nc><close>

302440.「おおっと 挑戦者 <pc>が\n ビビッて 先に ブレーキをかけた！\n だが:
Oh-ho! Looks like-a our challenger
<pc> got-a bit off more den dey
could chew! But it was-a just too soon!

302441.「我らが 流星の帝王は\n 見事 断崖スレスレで ストーップ！\n この勝負 ミ:
With da stunning-a stop right on the edge
o' the cliff! Our own Meteor Queen Mitra is-a
da winner!

302443.ショックのあまり 意識が 遠のいていく……。:
Completely shocked, they fell into
unconsciousness...

302444.「……おおっと！？\n 両者 まだ ブレーキをかける様子がない！\n コイツは:
...What's-a this now?! Neither a' them is
usin' the brakes just-a yet! Molto magnifico!

302445.さらに 断崖が 近づいてきた……。\nブレーキを かけますか？<yesno_nc:
The cliff is approaching even closer...
Press on the brakes?<yesno_nc><close>

302446.「おおっと 挑戦者 <pc>は\n まだ ブレーキをかけない！\n おいおいおい:
Well-a now! Our challenger <pc>
still won't use-a da brakes! Hey, hey!
Are you-a crazy in the head?!

302447.<pc>は 勢いよく 海につっこんだ！:
<pc> plunged into the ocean with
a splendid splash!

302448.「はっはっは！ あわれな挑戦者が\n 海に ダーーーーーイブッ！\n この勝負:
Ahaha! Da chump challenger <pc>
decides to-a take-a the swim instead!!
Mitra is-a our winner!

302450.ショックのあまり 意識が 遠のいていく……。:
Completely shocked, they fell into
unconsciousness...

302451.「おおっと！？\n ここで 挑戦者 <pc>が\n ブレーキを かけたぁ！:
Well now! Challenger <pc>
decides to-a hit da brakes!

302452.「……いい読みだが まだ甘いな。\n その程度で 私を出し抜くことはできん！:
...not bad, but still too naive. You won't
be able to outsmart me that easily!

302457.「フッ 帝王である この私を負かすとは。\n さすがは 四天の星巡りを乗り越えた:
Hmph. To defeat me, the emperor... You are
no doubt the champion who overcame the
Four Heavenly Trials.

302458.「……言い訳はしない。約束は約束だ。\n 天星郷に 戻るとしよう。\n 羽根を渡:
No excuses this time. A promise is a promise.
I'll go back to the Firmament with you. The
feather, if you would.

302460.「これを 受けとったら ミト様\n 元いた場所に 帰っちゃうんでしょ！？\n そ:
If I take this, then Mitie doesn't have to,
like, leave all of us, right?! There's no way
I'm gonna let her!!

302461.「ミト様 超つらそうな顔してたもん！\n そんな思いさせるんだったら\n 絶対に:
You looked SO miserable, you know!!
If they're gonna make you feel that way, then
they can just FORGET about taking you!!

302463.「……事情は知らんが アレ\n アンタらの だいじなものなんだろ？\n 追っかけ:
...not really sure what's-a goin' on here,
but...that thing's pretty importante, no?
Maybe you should-a go after her.

302464.「ピコなら 北東の 崩れゆく廃墟の近くにある\n 枯れ木のとこに いるはずだ。ア:
Pico should be near dat dead lookin' tree to da northeast, close to those crumbling ruins. Whenever she's-a feeling not so, how
you say..."fresh", she goes-a there.

302465.「なら 私もいっしょに\n ……へ へ へっくしょん！！:
Then I'll help you go after...
Aaa...AAA...ACHOO!!

302466.「ああ～！ ダメですよ ミトラー様～！\n そのままだと 風邪ひいちゃいますって:
No, no! You can't! You'll catch-a the cold
if you go out there all soppin' wet!

302467.「まったくです。\n 私たちが ピコさんを 追いかけますから\n 天使長は 無理:
He's right. You can leave Pico to us, so you
shouldn't push yourself too hard, Archangel.

302468.「ピコさんだって ちゃんと\n 話をすれば わかってくれるはずです。\n 急いで:
I'm sure Pico will understand even us if we
just explain ourselves. Let's hurry and go
after her!

302561.「あ～ おっかなかったぁ……。\n 思いっきり クラッシュしちゃったけど\n ア:
Wow, that was like, super scary...and I
crashed really, really bad... Is my bike gonna
be okay?
